title: Morningstar
data:
{{version031}} {{weapon |name = Morningstar |cost = ? |weight = 14.0 |skill = Maces & Flails |damage = 13 |accuracy = -2 |basedelay = 15 (150%) |mindelay = 7 at skill 16 |hands = 1H |size = Medium |ranged = No |acquirement = 10 }} {{flavour|A mace with a head covered in short spikes. ---- "Little did then his pomp of plumes bestead
The Azteca, or glittering pride of gold.
Against the tempered sword; little his casque,
Cay with its feathery coronal, or drest
In graven terrors, when the Briton's hand
Drove in through helm and head the spiked mace;
Or swung its iron weights in shattering sway.
Which, where they fell, destroyed." -Robert Southey, _Madoc_. 1805}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the [[Maces & Flails]] category. It is a one handed weapon.}} Morningstars have the best damage of all the "common" one-handed weapons, although with no special abilities like [[cleaving]] or [[reaching]]. They are reasonable weapons to use until you find an [[eveningstar]], [[demon whip]], or a two-handed weapon. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Morningstar1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Morningstar2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Morningstar3.png]] |- ! || '''[[Unrandarts|Unrandart]]''' |- | '''[[Eos]]''' || [[File:New eos.png]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.12]], morningstars had only 10 base damage and -1 accuracy. {{weapons}} [[Category:Maces & Flails]]
